title: Constantine Chest
description:
The grand Baroque style of the Constantine collection is sure to impress. With a beautiful bronze finish to emphasize the scrollwork and regal aspects of the collection. The bed features intricately carved embellishments and an oversized PU padded headboard, it is sure to be the focal point of your bedroom. The matching case goods provide style and plenty of storage with their ample drawers. Transform your bedroom into a glamorous boudoir with the Constantine collection.
